item.title: Guthix Portal Case Problem
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

I have case 4408: int get = getportals(); if (get == 1 && (castleWarsOn == false)) { if(castleWarsOn == false) teleportToX = 2372; //Teleport to arena teleportToY = 3130; //Teleport to arena heightLevel = 1; //Teleport to arena playerIsZamorak = true; //Make player Zamorak addItem(4042, 1); //Add cloak sendMessage("You joined the Zamorak Team!"); } else { sendMessage("A game is currently running. Please wait "+cwTimer/2+" more seconds."); } } else if(castleWarsOn == false) { teleportToX = 2427; //Teleport to arena teleportToY = 3077; //Teleport to arena heightLevel = 1; //Teleport to arena playerIsSaradomin = true; //Make player Saradomin addItem(4041, 1); //Add cloak wear(4041, getItemSlot(4041)); //Equip cloak sendMessage("You joined the Saradomin Team!"); } break;
To make my Guthix portal work randomly, but I keep getting 100 errors, I’ve tried everything, what have I done wrong?

Read full topic
